column5: This Mid-Century home was 100% remodeled in 2016, is 5-10 minutes to downtown, the Riverwalk, the Alamo, the Pearl, restaurants, bars and more.   Enjoy a vacation, or even a long weekend, in a completely remodeled 3 bdrm, 2 bath home. Surround yourself with modern luxuries and brand new high-end furniture & d√©cor. Outside you can entertain your family and friends around the heated pool. The house is equipped with cable, Wi-Fi, free Netflix, central heat & A/C.
column8: Uptown remodel in 2016 w/Heated Pool, NC location
